des:
Nice simplifies your everyday movements, creating a world without barriers. The wonder of smart home automations will suddenly become an essential element for your life.
The Nice skill for Amazon Alexa will make easier to control gates, garage doors, blinds, lights and much more, without even lifting a finger.
All compatible devices connected to your Nice account will be yours to command; you just need to ask: "Alexa open garage door”, "Alexa open front gate”, "Alexa close kitchen blinds”…
To control Nice devices with Alexa, you need:
· A MyNice Account
· At least one configured IoT Gateway/Interface: Nice CORE, Nice IT4WiFI
· At least one configured device: gate, garage door, blinds, lighting system and much more
